 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹהֶ֫לֶת‎</span>, ( <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺהֶ֫לֶת‎</span> [[Eccl.12.8|Eccl 12:8]]) **noun masculine**<sup>[[Eccl.1.2|Eccl 1:2]]</sup> ==collector== (of sentences), or ([[BDB#AV|AV]] [[BDB#RV|RV]]) ==preacher== (***concionator*** [[BDB#Jer|Jerome]]: <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἐκκλησιαστής</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] (member of an <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἐκκλησία</span>); feminine either of office, [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:122r»§ 122r</sup> [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#Che|Che]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֹפֶרֶת‎</span> [[Ezra.2.55|Ezra 2:55]] <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***Khalif***; German ***Majestät, Excellenz***; or as in Arabic with intensive force, one realizing the idea in its completeness (compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***great collector***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***deep investigator*** (formed like <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹהֶלֶת‎</span>), [[BDB#W|W]]<sup>AG i. § 233 R. c.</sup> see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>Intr. 466</sup>; [[BDB#RV|RVm]] ***great orator***): hence either ***convener***, or ***great collector*** (of sentences), compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּעֲלֵי אֲסֻפּוֺת‎</span> [[Eccl.12.11|Eccl 12:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎למעא דברי חפץ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בקּשׁ ק‎</span> v[[Eccl.12.10|Eccl 12:10]] (but [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>Einl. 428</sup> [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>l.c.</sup> and others ***speaker in assembly***, Plumptre ***debater***)); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> a king in Jerusalem, son of David, probably = Solomon, the pseudonym of book of Ecclesiastes: [[Eccl.1.1|Eccl 1:1]], v[[Eccl.1.2|Eccl 1:2]] (apposition of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲנִי‎</span>), called <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חכם‎</span> [[Eccl.12.9|Eccl 12:9]] compare v[[Eccl.12.10|Eccl 12:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אמר ק‎</span> [[Eccl.1.2|Eccl 1:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אמר הק‎</span> [[Eccl.12.8|Eccl 12:8]] = [[Eccl.7.27|Eccl 7:27]] for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אמרה ק‎</span>.
